Name: ECLIPSE - Partial [A14]
Description:
REQUIRES CD2 beta 16a+ (Updated), MEV v5.4, DEA and EEE. Recommended VEA. This is a harder Send it! Interstellar with Gradual Difficulty increase (Start at Lv3) by time. Each 50 Golds in Deposit Bank will recover 90s of Threat Meter. DO NOT ENABLE MODS THAT CLEAN UP THE GOLD CHUNK AS THIS WILL MAKE THE DIFFICULTY EVEN MORE HARDER OR HAVING BEER THAT BUFFS GOLD RATIO TO MAKE DIFFICULTY EASIER.
    Alpha 14:
  - Removed the Black Hole enemy (Too difficult to balance).
  - Removed Shade.
  - Uranus: Scale 1.2 -> 1.5.
  - Teleport Praetorian: Replaced to Fire Praetorian since it's too OP.
  - Ossiran Scrab: Added to the pool at Level 1 with MinSpawnCount 1, MaxSpawnCount 20, DifficultyRating 35, Rarity 5.125, SpawnAmountModifier 0.7.
  - Pit Jaw: DifficultyRating increased to 150, MaxSpawnCount 0, Rarity 5 and SpawnAmountModifier 0.5.
  - The Sun: Reworked, now on active it increases all normal Grunt and normal Praetorian type enemies' Movement Speed by 35%, and Immune to Stun and Fear effect.

ED_Welcome_Message.DisplayName: Welcome to Eclipse. Every 50 Gold Deposit will recharge the Threat Meter.

Messages.Message: BLACK HOLE SPAWNED! DO NOT JUMP!
